akas: The King of Christmas World-wide (English title) (literal English title)
akas from release info: The King of Christmas World-wide (English title) (literal English title)

1.title: 1.desember
1.plot: Kevin has decided that this Christmas is going to be the best one ever. Several things might spoil his plans, which is why he has prepared extra well. But this year's Christmas still might turn out to be quite different than he imagined it.

2.title: 2.desember
2.plot: Kevin wants to find out more about the mysterious glove he found, but Peder interferes and spoils that plan; the Grans are ordered to temporarily leave their home while it is cleaned for fungus. They might spend Christmas at Peder's place.

3.title: 3.desember
3.plot: Kevin explores the secret valley he found through his cave, and meets a couple of kids who have neither seen snow nor celebrated Christmas before. Back in our world, Kevin is paired up with Eiril for the annual gingerbread house contest.

4.title: 4.desember
4.plot: The people of Ridderdalen is surprised when Kevin brings snow to the valley, as they haven't seen snow in ten years, when the queen and the magic glove that makes snow disappeared. Mira is excited that her "princess test" went as she hoped.

5.title: 5.desember
5.plot: When Kevin brings a homemade snow machine to Ridderdalen, they are so ecstatic they appoint him the new king, with the hope that he can restore Christmas. However, Snerk, the king's dubious wizard brother, is not too fond of that idea.

6.title: 6.desember
6.plot: Kevin invites the valley kids to the castle to celebrate the day of the children. To be able to spend the night there, he lies to his parents about his whereabouts. Meanwhile, someone else discovers the path between the two worlds.

7.title: 7.desember
7.plot: Realizing he is believed to magically make snow within days, Kevin worries he will be exposed as a fraud in Ridderdalen; Ante and Anti explore the big unknown that is Sølvskogen; Eiril is forced to lie on behalf of Kevin.

8.title: 8.desember
8.plot: Kevin tries to get back the glove that Peder stole, which proves to be problematic; Eiril is furious at Kevin, having had to build their gingerbread house on her own; Sara investigates some missing Christmas balls; Mira meets the knights.

9.title: 9. desember
9.plot: The gingerbread contest is here. Kevin has a plan to get the glove back so he and his family can celebrate Christmas in Ridderdalen; Eiril grows more and more worried about her mother's depression; Mira and Lamarr decide to get married.

10.title: 10. desember
10.plot: After challenging Peder to a sword fight to get the glove, Kevin is in desperate need of training, so he goes to Skare for help. Ante and Anti continues to struggle in Sølvskogen, and something happens for the first time in ten years.

11.title: 11. desember
11.plot: Kevin is torn about whether he should fight Peder, but it might be the only way to get the glove; Eiril continues to search for answers about her mother; Mira and Lamarr find the lost knights, who are now wanted by the police.

12.title: 12. desember
12.plot: Kevin has finally gotten his hands on the glove, but can't get it to work. He goes to Ridderdalen to find Sølve and get more answers. However, the ones he gets aren't quite what he expected.

13.title: 13. desember
13.plot: When Kevin finds out that Ante and Anti are in town, he is worried that they are after the glove. He asks Eiril to look after it, which gives surprising results. Mira and Lamarr find out that the knights stole the Christmas balls.

14.title: 14. desember
14.plot: Mira and Lamarr make a plan to take the Christmas balls from the knights and get a share of the bounty money; after Eiril tells him about the shocking results of her trying the glove, Kevin wants to find out more.

15.title: 15. desember
15.plot: Just as Kevin is about to deliver the glove to Sølve, he is made the main suspect of the Christmas ball investigation. He claims his innocence, but an ashamed and humiliated Sara does not believe him and won't let him go until he admits it.

16.title: Snødagen
16.plot: The Snow Day, where Kevin is expected to make snow in Ridderdalen, is here. Kevin rushes to Ridderdalen to get the glove delivered to Sølve, but an unpleasant surprise is waiting for him and complicates things further.

17.title: 17. desember
17.plot: Kevin and Eiril search for the glove after he lost it. After she showed him her newfound silver hair, Kevin suspects it has something to do with the glove. Snerk shapes up to take over as king.

18.title: 18. desember
18.plot: Randi has found the glove and has it locked up inside her shopping center; Kevin thinks Eiril's mom is the vanished queen. They find a secret room in her house that strengthens his theory; Snerk, now king of the valley, cancels Christmas.

19.title: 19. desember
19.plot: Kevin takes Eiril to Ridderdalen to meet Morild and try to straighten up the mess he made. Anton confronts Randi and makes a very important decision.

20.title: 20. desember
20.plot: As Kevin tells Iris everything he knows about the glove and Ridderdalen, Snerk approaches Sølvskogen to find the glove. Anton and Mira are in the woods to pick out a Christmas tree and finds a big surprise on the way.

21.title: 21. desember
21.plot: Eiril refuses to go to Ridderdalen, as she wants to stay at Sølvskogen with Kevin; Peder is starting to feel remorse about the way he has treated Kevin; Snerk plans an attack against Sølvskogen.

22.title: 22. desember
22.plot: Snerk has gathered a troop of knights headed for Sølvskogen to fight, and Skare and Fnugg follow them. When they hear the plan, they try to reach the queen first to warn her; Kevin and Peder plan a heist to get the glove back from the mall.

23.title: 23. desember
23.plot: Snerk has kidnapped Iris, and Kevin has a plan to save her from the knights, with the help of Eiril, Fnugg and Skare. But not everything goes smoothly, and they have to improvise to finally get the kingdom the fairy tale ending it deserves.

24.title: 24. desember
24.plot: As Kevin and Eiril are on their way to get his family to Ridderdalen so they can celebrate Christmas there, they discover that the cave is falling apart. Is something happening to the opening? Will there be a proper Christmas celebration?

imdb.plot outline: Nine-year-old Kevin lives in a boring neighborhood in small town Sølvskogen (Silver Forest), with his rather eccentric middle class family. He is bullied at school, but too scared to say anything to anyone. But his life takes a solid turn when he in best Narnia style encounters the magic kingdom Ridderdalen (Knight Valley) with knights and a big castle. However, this kingdom has not celebrated Christmas in several years, because Queen Iris and her daughter mysteriously disappeared, along with a magical silver glove that was used to make snow with, and King Sølve went into depression and now lives out in the wild with no intention of coming back. Snerk, the king's dubious brother, desperately wants the throne, but is in no position to claim it without the glove. When Kevin arrives and brings snow from the other side, the residents of the kingdom mistakenly believes he has the ability to make snow. He is therefore appointed the new king, and promises that he will restore Christmas before Christmas Eve. But what happens when the people of Ridderdalen sooner or later finds out that Kevin is a fraud? Also, Kevin has to balance his new life with his old one, where he has to hide the truth from everyone; his family, including his curious little sister Mira; Eiril, his kindhearted new best friend; and Peder, his bully who will do anything to make Kevin's life as miserable as possible. Several plot twists also helps making this adventure all the more exciting.
imdb.title: Julekongen
plot: Nine-year-old Kevin lives in a boring neighborhood in small town Sølvskogen (Silver Forest), with his rather eccentric middle class family. He is bullied at school, but too scared to say anything to anyone. But his life takes a solid turn when he in best Narnia style encounters the magic kingdom Ridderdalen (Knight Valley) with knights and a big castle. However, this kingdom has not celebrated Christmas in several years, because Queen Iris and her daughter mysteriously disappeared, along with a magical silver glove that was used to make snow with, and King Sølve went into depression and now lives out in the wild with no intention of coming back. Snerk, the king's dubious brother, desperately wants the throne, but is in no position to claim it without the glove. When Kevin arrives and brings snow from the other side, the residents of the kingdom mistakenly believes he has the ability to make snow. He is therefore appointed the new king, and promises that he will restore Christmas before Christmas Eve. But what happens when the people of Ridderdalen sooner or later finds out that Kevin is a fraud? Also, Kevin has to balance his new life with his old one, where he has to hide the truth from everyone; his family, including his curious little sister Mira; Eiril, his kindhearted new best friend; and Peder, his bully who will do anything to make Kevin's life as miserable as possible. Several plot twists also helps making this adventure all the more exciting.::The Norwegian Rocker
